headline: LEYBOLD ROOTS VACUUM PUMP

specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model WSU501
Pumping Speed 297.0 CFM (8,392.5 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.00E-5(En) torr (1.33E-5 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Foreline Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Backing Pump Speed 53.00 torr (70.66 mbar, 70.66 Pa)
Starting Pressure at Backing Pump Speed 28.00 torr (37.33 mbar, 37.33 Pa)
Max Pressure Difference for Cont Operation 60.00 torr (79.99 mbar, 79.99 Pa)
Oil Type Fomblin TM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 0.71 L (0.75 qt, 0.16 Br gal)
Motor Horsepower 2.4 HP
Rotational Speed 3,480 RPM
Refurbished YES
Other Information Unit set up for horizontal pumping applications.
Power Requirements 230/460 V 10.0 A 5.8 A(2) 60 Hz 3 Phase
Condition Excellent
